title: OpenAI partners with Scale to provide support for enterprises fine-tuning models
summary: OpenAI and Scale have partnered to offer fine-tuning capabilities for OpenAI's advanced models. This allows companies to customize these models on their proprietary data, enhancing their performance and usefulness. The partnership with Scale, a preferred partner of OpenAI, brings enterprise-grade functionality, data enrichment, and model evaluation expertise to the fine-tuning process. Scale has already demonstrated the value of fine-tuning GPT-3.5 for Brex. The data used for fine-tuning is owned by the customer and not used by OpenAI or any other organization for training other models.
